title: Getting then "Unable to connect to the server.Please check your network" loading bug every game.
body: Just randomly throughout mid patch 6.6 ive been getting loading errors. At the start of this patch i was able to play fine everything was working swell ( besides my teams ;) ) but this is no joking matter. I was playing yesterday all fine than at night i started getting the "Unable to connect to the server.Please check your network connection" every time i started trying to play a game. My internet is fine and i have repaired and reinstalled league since it stopped working. I am with internet iprimus is that helps... SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME, MY HOLIDAYS ARE RUNNING OUT AND I HAVEN'T EVEN CLIMBED, AT ALL!!!!

replies.body:
Have you tried restarting you computer? That worked for me. I made a post about the same issue:
 http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/G0myHOf1-whenever-i-go-in-game-and-load-it-goes-to-main-menu-screen-saying-to-reconnect-cause-of-a-crash 
and a Wrenchman responded so you can try that as well.  
Hope this helps. 
Catspeare {{champion:268}}
